title: Ramadan 2026 working hours in the UAE: Revised timings from Feb 19
summary_full: The Philippine Embassy in Abu Dhabi and Consulate General in Dubai have announced revised, shorter working hours for Ramadan 2026, from February 19th. These adjustments aim to accommodate fasting practices and ensure efficient service delivery for the large Filipino community in the UAE. Residents are urged to book appointments early and rely on official advisories for updated information.
